bibl.title: Notes on the Lithika of Posidippus.
Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309)
bibl.author: HUNTER, Richard

bibl.note: P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, coll. i, 2-iv, 6 = 1-20 Austin-Bastianini.
bibl.seg: HUNTER Richard, Notes on the Lithika of Posidippus.

Benjamin ACOSTA-HUGHES, Elizabeth KOSMETATOU and Manuel BAUMBACH (Edd.), Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309) = Hellenic Studies. 2 (Washington, D.C. - Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2004) pp. 94-104.
